Texts.Chs: ...通过适当地组合这些远古产物，你就可以获得让你的战斗变得相对惊人地轻松，并且很容易与敌人保持距离的武器。你需要一个远古神器，一个未知能量核心和一个远古残卷。务必正确地说出祷词，也许这么做很困难，但你为了在合成它时活下来，必须这么做。
Texts.Eng: ...and by properly combining these artifacts, you'll be able to grapple with amazing ease and throw yourself long distances: 1 Elder Artifact, 1 Unknown Reactor and 1 Elder Fragments. Be sure to utter the prayer correctly. The gutteral language is difficult but accuracy is survival, in this case.
